project_context: Scam & Imposters are everywhere on YouTube. People are losing millions to these nasty people. It is clear Google needs help in this fight
Government regulation can have a major effect on the effectiveness, innovation, value and even viability of cryptocurrency business models
As the Cardano network grows and ADA becomes more popular the threats from bad actors will also increase.
There should be more Mission Driven Pools (MDPs) helping secure Cardano's decentralised network + having a positive impact in the world.
CARDANO and the DLT-space are still very new to the world, with expected and unexpected risks and opportunities arising along the road.

The Cardano ecosystem is producing massive volumes of data, we need a scalable framework to correlate this data into real-time threats.
Cardano stakepool operators face a variety of cybersecurity risks that they have not adequately prepared to defend against.
Cardano giveaway scams are on the rise, with of users losing millions of USD via these scams. We need scalable ways of defending users.
New people in the crypto space fall for scams all the time. Organizations, and individuals within the community receive threats of violence.
